chav1961.purelib.basic.interfaces

Interface SpiService<Type>

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    FileSystemInterface, Localizer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractFileSystem, AbstractLocalizer, AbstractNanoServiceFileSystem, DebuggingLocalizer, FileSystemInMemory, FileSystemLocalizer, FileSystemOnFile, FileSystemOnFileSystem, FileSystemOnRMI, FileSystemOnXMLReadOnly, PropertiesLocalizer, PureLibLocalizer

    public interface SpiService<Type>

    This interface describes any SPI member. Every purelib SPI implementation must implements this interface (see META-INF/services for details)

    Since:
    0.0.2
    Author:
    Alexander Chernomyrdin aka chav1961

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean canServe(URI resource)
      Does the SPI support the given resource URI
      Type newInstance(URI resource)
      Get SPI instance to serve the given resource URI

    • Method Detail

      • canServe

        boolean canServe(URI resource)
          throws NullPointerException

        Does the SPI support the given resource URI

        Parameters:
        resource - resource URI to check
        Returns:
        true if supports
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - on null resource URI

      • newInstance

        Type newInstance(URI resource)
          throws EnvironmentException,
                 NullPointerException,
                 IllegalArgumentException

        Get SPI instance to serve the given resource URI

        Parameters:
        resource - resource URI to get instance for
        Returns:
        instance to serve the URI
        Throws:
        EnvironmentException - when instance can't be created for the given URI
        NullPointerException - when requested URI is null
        IllegalArgumentException - when requested URI has wrong format or is not supported by the given SPI service
